backend/main.mo: Motoko canister defining schools, staff, reports, user profiles, and access control with stable storage, upgrade hooks, and authorization mixins.
feature_evidence.json: Minimal feature evidence report file with an empty features list.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Text file containing prewritten summaries of all frontend files for reference.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base stylesheet defining OKLCH color variables and dark theme overrides.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point mounting the React app and loading main.tsx.
frontend/README.md: Project documentation describing features, roles, setup, deployment, and architecture of the Inkog reporting system.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Sets up TanStack Router with routes for entry, student, staff, and admin pages and forces dark mode.
frontend/src/components/AccessDeniedScre: UI card shown when a user lacks staff or admin permissions with navigation back to home.
frontend/src/components/admin/SchoolForm: Dialog form for creating or editing schools using admin mutations with loading states.
frontend/src/components/admin/StaffFormD: Dialog form for creating or editing staff accounts including principal, school assignment, and enabled toggle.
frontend/src/components/auth/AuthGateErr: Error card displayed when authorization checks fail, showing the error and a retry button.
frontend/src/components/auth/LoginButton: A login/logout button using Internet Identity that manages authentication status and clears queries upon logout.
Defines the main application layout with header, footer, and routed content via Outlet.
frontend/src/components/reports/ReportSt: Provides a dropdown for staff to mark reports as reviewed or resolved using a status update mutation.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to the user's identity, invalidating dependent queries when it changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useAdmin.ts: Admin-focused hooks for managing schools and staff with CRUD operations and related query invalidation.
frontend/src/hooks/useAuth.ts: Determines authentication state, admin/staff roles, and exposes related loading and error info.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity login, logout, and identity persistence via a React context and AuthClient.
frontend/src/hooks/useSchools.ts: Fetches all schools through the backend actor when available.
frontend/src/hooks/useStaffReports.ts: Retrieves reports for a school and provides a mutation to update report status.
frontend/src/hooks/useStudentReport.ts: Offers a mutation for submitting anonymous student reports and invalidates stats on success.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with QueryClientProvider and InternetIdentityProvider.
frontend/src/pages/AdminDashboardPage.ts: Renders the admin dashboard with tabs for overview, schools, and staff, including CRUD dialogs and stats.
frontend/src/pages/AdminGatePage.tsx: Handles admin authentication and authorization flow, showing loading, login, error, access denied, or the admin dashboard depending on auth state.
frontend/src/pages/EntryPage.tsx: Landing page presenting role-based entry cards for students, staff, and admins with navigation actions.
frontend/src/pages/StaffDashboardPage.ts: Displays staff report dashboard with filtering, statistics, and report status management for a staff member's school.
frontend/src/pages/StaffGatePage.tsx: Controls staff authentication and authorization flow, showing login, errors, disabled account notice, or the staff dashboard.
frontend/src/pages/StudentReportPage.tsx: Provides a form for students to anonymously submit reports, selecting a school and category with success feedback.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility functions for reading, persisting, and clearing URL parameters using query strings and sessionStorage.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration enabling dark mode, custom OKLCH color palette, extended animations, and typography/container/animate plugins.
